Reviews.Title: I. Hate. This. Computer.
Reviews.Author: Lina
Reviews.Content: I sincerely hate this laptop. I have had it for just a few months and the fan is already gone. From the looks of online research, I am in no way the only one with this issue. Luckily, there is a manufacturer's limited warranty for one year on it, but wouldn't you rather have a laptop you don't need to use the warranty for? I had an Asus before I got this one. This was meant to be a temporary replacement, but I got stuck with it. My Asus was great until I dropped it while running. That was my fault, but I never once had any issue with my Asus, and I will never buy this brand PC again.
